Header: Senior Colonels Promoted to Brigadier Rank
Content: HE the President Maithripala Sirisena, Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces has promoted thirty-one Senior Colonels of the Army to the rank of temporary Brigadier states a communiqu√© issued by the Military Secretariat on Friday (16) evening. Here follows the newly promoted Brigadiers; Colonel C.D Ranasinghe RWP RSP Colonel K.G.M.S Fernando Colonel S.P.A.I.M.B Samarakoon Hdmc Lsc Colonel H.M.H.N Herath Colonel S.N.A Dissanayaka ato Colonel W.M.R.W.W.H.J.B Wanigasekera USP Colonel K.P.S Silva Colonel W.B.W.M.R.S.P Aluwihare RWP RSP Colonel E.A.D.P Edirisingha psc Colonel U.P.R Weerakoon WWV RWP RSP USP Colonel K.A Samarasiri RWP RSP USP psc Colonel N.P.A Gunawardena RSP Colonel L.C.R Jayasuriya RSP psc Colonel K.P.S.A Fernando RWP RSP Colonel R.B Benjamin RSP USP Colonel S.R.B Aluvihare RWP RSP psc Colonel W.P.A.D.W Nanayakkara RSP USP Colonel B.K.G.M.L Rodrigo RSP psc IG Colonel A.M Muttalib Colonel M.G.W.W.W.M.C.B Wickramasinghe RWP RSP psc Colonel I.H.M.T.H Senaratne USP Colonel M.K.U.P Gunaratne RSP psc IG Colonel S.W.M Fernando WWV RWP RSP USP psc Colonel K.A.W.S Ratnayake Colonel K.A.A Udaya Kumara RSP USP psc Colonel L.P.K.C Wijetunge RWP RSP USP Colonel D.P Jayasinghe RSP Colonel E.A.P Ediriweera RWP Colonel R.W Ponnamperuma RSP psc Colonel A.S Wickramasena RWP RSP USP psc Hdmc Colonel D.L.S.U de Silva USP
